title: ISic001696. Fragment of a public inscription
body:
Facsimile Images




Apparatus criticus

Text of Arena 2020

translation

commentary

The surviving letters in form and size leave open the possibility that this fragment comes originally from one of the tabulae of the cadastral inscription, ISic001174.

bibliography

  • Arena 2020 83-85 no. 7 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002404
